content.rendered:
Transform your lovemaking into erotic ecstasy with the secrets of the Kama Sutra – the most ancient, renowned and explicit guide to sexual pleasure.

Sex is an integral and indispensable part of life. The Kama Sutra of Vatsyayana is a classic treatise on the science and art of sex and love. Written about 1600 years ago, this work has stood the test of centuries, and can best be summarized in the following words.
